meanings.definition: The action or process of selecting or being selected.
meanings.sent1: Her selections for the team were based on skill and dedication.
meanings.sent2: The store offers a wide range of selections for customers to choose from.
meanings.sent3: His selections for the school play were so good, they made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of life, our selections shape the bouquet of our experiences.
meanings.sent5: The chef's careful selections of ingredients made the dish truly exceptional.

meanings.definition: A carefully chosen or representative collection of things.
meanings.sent1: The art gallery displayed a stunning array of selections from various artists.
meanings.sent2: The menu had a great selection of dishes to satisfy different tastes.
meanings.sent3: Her selections of books were so interesting, they kept her up all night reading.
meanings.sent4: The museum's selections of artifacts told a rich story of the past.
meanings.sent5: The music store had a diverse selection of albums for music lovers to enjoy.

meanings.definition: The act of choosing someone or something from a group.
meanings.sent1: His selections for the basketball team were based on skill and teamwork.
meanings.sent2: The selection of the best candidate for the job took careful consideration.
meanings.sent3: Her selections for the movie night were so bad, they ended up watching a comedy instead.
meanings.sent4: Life's selection of challenges can sometimes feel overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The selection of the winning entry was a moment of great excitement for the participants.
